Pick up your trusty crowbar and play as the world’s most recognizable scientist of the ravaged Earth as you battle against the alien Combine in defense of a ravaged Planet Earth.  Beware the headhumpers, the zombies, and enemy snipers as your progress through a dangerous world armed with a variety of awesome weapons and your quick reflexes.

Half Life 2 is an intense first-person shooter of high acclaim—and I must admit that I hadn’t played it before now.  I was not disappointed as the game has aged rather well and was very compelling and fun to play.  The storytelling is superb and, even though I had never played any of the other titles in the Half Life series, I wasn’t lost.  The gameplay, coupled with the amazing music and beautiful, albeit dated, world left me breathless.  There are several zones to travel through such as the strange industrial City 17, the the devastated Highway along the Coast, the zombie infested Ravenholm, and even the expansive horror known as Nova Prospekt.  Additionally, the physics in this game is astounding, especially for its time, and the puzzles that involved this aspect of the game were fun and enjoyable to figure out.

I played the game twice; once to enjoy the journey and action and the second to get the achievements that I had missed the first time through.  The game was of perfect length with ample breathing room between the extreme action scenes.  The only negative part about my experience was that the game was bugged and I was unable to get one of the achievements (the Lambda Locator) and I was unwilling to uninstall and reinstall to try again.  Other than that; the game was perfect, fun, and very memorable.

I wholeheartedly recommend this game.  If you are into good stories and first-person shooters with plenty of action and sights to see than Half Life 2 is the game for you.

作为一个填补童年的玩家，我觉得这游戏难玩在你根本不知道下一条路在哪，还有少得可怜的子弹和数不清的僵尸和联盟军，玩久了真的感觉好绝望，不过一旦找到方向，又会情不自禁的继续玩下去。

half-life
/ˈhaf ˌlīf/
noun
the time taken for the radioactivity of a specified isotope to fall to half its original value.
"iodine-131 has a half-life of 8.1 days"
the time required for any specified property (e.g. the concentration of a substance in the body) to decrease by half.

No hay mejor sensación que darle oportunidad a los grandes juegos que todos idolatran, pero es más satisfactorio cuando el titulo es excelente. 
Eso pasa con Half-Life 2 (y sus episodios). 
No hay mucho que decir que no se haya dicho antes por miles de personas, así que aún más con un precio tan bajo, no hay excusa para dejar pasar una leyenda e inspiración del medio. 
Buena suerte en ciudad 17 y recuerda ...

Решил тут перед релизом HL: Alyx вспомнить былые времена и освежить воспоминания о 2 части легендарной франшизы. Вынужден признать, что по некоторым аспектам время игру всё-же не пощадило, однако те механики, которые в ней заложены были передовыми для своего времени, да и сейчас дадут фору многим современным проектам. Я не без удовольствия в очередной раз прошёл Half-Life 2, будто бы вернулся на полтора десятилетия в прошлое и, надо сказать, это было чертовски круто! Пойду загружу Episode One.
